name: SoccerBlast
0:
”Alexa open soccer blast”
”Alexa launch soccer blast”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: soccer blast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Soccer Blast, the ultimate international football focus for 2022!

Hear daily updates on all the thrilling action at this Winter's championship and take part in a daily quiz throughout the build up to the competition and throughout.

Become a Soccer Blast VIP where you can represent your chosen country and compete head-to-head with football fans across the world with the chance to top our leader board and become our Soccer Blast World Champion.

Don't forget to come back every day to increase your Soccer Streak!

Things you can say:
 • “Help”, if you need help during the game
 • “Repeat” To hear what Alexa said again

⭐Soccer Blast is brought to you by Yak Yak Games⭐

Simply say: “Alexa, open Soccer Blast”, to start playing!

To feedback email us at play@yakyakgames.com and tell us what you think. We would love to hear from you!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
